Audioclip

Totally gnarly library for playing audio clips.

Create audioclip play functions from your remote sound files.

1 var snare = audioclip ('/path/to/your/awesome/snare/clip.mp3');
2 
3 // :: boom, clap!
4 snare();

Timing and Scheduling

Specify how long to skip, how long to play, and how long to wait before playing any clip.

1 var boombass = audioclip('/boombass.ogg');
2 boombass(delay, offset, duration);
